scripts.publish:patch-rc-dry: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as patch --prerelease rc --dry-run
scripts.publish:patch-rc: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as patch --prerelease rc && yarn publish --tag rc && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish:patch-next: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as patch --prerelease next && yarn publish --tag next --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish:patch: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as patch && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish:minor: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as minor && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish:major: yarn test && yarn build && standard-version --release-as major && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
